pages.text: Surviving my *very* personal encounter with Incandescent Amalgam gave me... an idea. As amalgam has immense explosive properties, so too does the Manastorm Charge. With what I have learned, it is trivial to, instead of waste a Gaia Spirit on such an explosive, use some much more readily available amalgam in its manufacture.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Why two? I wondered that myself... maybe it is more efficient this way?
